mapper.select: SELECT LEVEL , MU.MENU_NO AS ID , MU.MENU_URL , MU.MENU_GUBUN , MU.MENU_NAME AS TEXT , CASE WHEN MU.MENU_NO = '0' THEN '#' ELSE MU.UPPER_MENU_NO END PARENT , MU.USE_YN , MU.REMARK , CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MENU WHERE UPPER_MENU_NO = MU.MENU_NO) = '0' THEN '/images/lgs/code.png' ELSE '/images/lgs/file.png' END AS ICON FROM MENU MU START WITH MU.MENU_NO = '0' CONNECT BY PRIOR MU.MENU_NO = MU.UPPER_MENU_NO
SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM MENU
